english.segment1: Finish up your coffee, love. it's getting cold. let's finish up this fight tonight. before the sun draws neigh and I'm old
english.segment2: Have mercy on me I'm a girl. though I'm cruel and you cry. I won't shiver cause I know how to break a man. I know how to break a man in two
english.segment3: Still you're suffering, my love. o, who's to blame?. you might be tired, but I'm not through fanning the flame
english.segment4: o, by the tiding of my tounge. I lie and sing what can't be unsung. my soul torn in two by the things I say to you. by the things that I say
english.segment5: I know how to break us man, in two
